SEARCH
Package sml

Class Bridge

java.lang.Object
sml.Bridge
public class Bridge extends Object
Utility Class. Used as A wrapper to byPass access privileges for subclass instructions that live in a different package. It has two Fields that it knows about 1.Labels: keeps track of index of instructions implemented as a ArrayList 2.Machine: which executes the program instructions. Used --> Bnznstruction execute method needs to set the program counter of the machine instance passed in. The problem is that machines instance of label is private. This class will be a field in bnz instruction. This means the BnzInstruction can now access the things it needs to apply its operations

    • setProgramCounter

      public void setProgramCounter(Machine machine, String labelDestination)
      The whole point of this class is to access the machines.labels() arrayList. once the Index of an Instruction is known a jump can be performed.
      Parameters:
      machine - context in which the program runs in
      labelDestination - String value to which the program counter of machine instance will be pointed to
